str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To give in marriage. From gamos; to espouse.
